fields.name: Hybrid Practice Drum Set Blue
fields.description: The Millenium MX422 Standard Set is a fully equipped drum kit with features you wouldn’t normally expect at this price point. The 22" bass drum, 10", 12", and 16" toms, and 14" x 5.5" wooden snare drum all feature a multi-ply construction that combines birch and poplar wood and form the backbone of the kit. The cymbal set consists of a 14" hi-hat, 16" crash, and 20" ride. To complete the picture, all of the necessary hardware is provided, including a drum stool. And since looks are just as important as features, the MX422 is available in two eye-catching finishes.
fields.product_dimensions:
Complete Drum Kit

  • Standard configuration
  • 9-Ply poplar / birchwood shell
  • Shells with wrap finish
  • 1.5 mm metal hoops on snare and toms
  • Wooden hoops on bass drum in shell colour
  • Colour: Blue Lining

Shell set consists of:

  • 22" x 16" Bass drum (bored)
  • 10" x 08" Tom Tom
  • 12" x 09" Tom Tom
  • 16" x 16" Floor tom
  • 14" x 5.5" Snare drum

Hardware set consists of:

  • Cymbal boom stand
  • Straight cymbal stand
  • Hi-Hat stand
  • Snare drum stand
  • Single pedal
  • Drum throne

Cymbal set consists of:

  • 14" Hi-hat
  • 16" Crash
  • 20" Ride

fields.name: Pearl Roadshow 22" Royal Blue M
fields.description: Regardless of when your rhythmic journey starts, Pearl's Roadshow Series has a drum set package to get you on the road to drumming greatness.

Complete Drum Kit

  • Roadshow Series
  • 9-Ply poplar shells with 7 mm wall thickness
  • Foil covered shells
  • Chrome shell hardware
  • RS525SC/C743

"Fusion" shell configuration:

  • 22" x 16" Kick drum
  • 10" x 08" Tom tom
  • 12" x 09" Tom tom
  • 16" x 16" Floor tom
  • 14" x 5.5" Snare drum

Other accessories included:

  • Double strut hardware
  • Foot pedal with double chain
  • Drummer's seat
  • Sabian Solar 14" Hi-Hat and 16" Crash
  • Stick bag
  • Sticks
